meanings.definition: The qualities traditionally associated with being a gentleman.
meanings.sent1: His gentlemanlinesses were evident in the way he held the door open for others.
meanings.sent2: She admired his gentlemanlinesses and appreciated his polite manners.
meanings.sent3: Despite his rugged appearance, his gentlemanlinesses shone through in his kind gestures.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of chaos, his gentlemanlinesses stood out like a beacon of light.
meanings.sent5: The essence of gentlemanlinesses is treating others with respect and kindness.

meanings.definition: The state or condition of possessing the characteristics of a gentleman.
meanings.sent1: The gentlemanlinesses of the old man were evident in his refined speech.
meanings.sent2: She aspired to achieve the same level of gentlemanlinesses as her role model.
meanings.sent3: His gentlemanlinesses were put to the test when he had to deal with a rude customer.
meanings.sent4: The town was known for its atmosphere of gentlemanlinesses and courtesy.
meanings.sent5: The young boy displayed remarkable gentlemanlinesses by helping the elderly lady with her groceries.
